subject: Help in writing Test Cases
msgSnippet: I have the Servlets and Beans written for an application. I need to test them to see if they are working  properly or not. I do understand that this needs to
messageBody:
I have the Servlets and Beans written for an application. I need to
test them to see if they are working properly or not.

I do understand that this needs to be done before the code was
written but as of now if I had to test some code after it is written
how do I approach it?
